description: Defines application theme and color constants for Flutter app, including light and dark themes with specific styling for UI components.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Contains static color constants used throughout the app.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides static getters for light and dark theme configurations using Material 3 design.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns the ThemeData configured for light mode with custom styles.

methods.name: darkTheme
methods.description: Returns the ThemeData configured for dark mode with custom styles.
